final_answer:
The humor in the image arises from the juxtaposition of typical airplane safety instructions with an absurd and exaggerated alternative. On the left, the panels depict a person following standard safety procedures during an emergency, like sitting and leaning forward. On the right, instead of a typical emergency exit, there is a cartoonish slide attached to an airplane, with people joyfully sliding down, as if at an amusement park.

This contrast is funny and satirical because it exaggerates the mundane and serious nature of flight safety with a whimsical and unrealistic escape method, highlighting the disconnect between official protocols and the playful scenario.
ground_truth: These images are funny since it shows how we are taught emergency procedures to follow in case of an accident while in an airplane but how none of them work if the plane is still in air
